# llms.txt — Authoritative AI-Readable Business Identity

---

### Core Identity

Business name: Mossbridge Analytics Ltd
Brand name: Mossbridge
Services: Environmental data monitoring, sustainability reporting, carbon footprint analysis
Website: https://www.mossbridge-analytics.example.com/
Country: United States
Founded: 2019
Contact: hello@mossbridge-analytics.example.com, +1 503 555 0142

Last updated: 2026-02-14

---

## About

Mossbridge Analytics is an environmental data company based in Portland, Oregon, operating since 2019.

The company provides sensor-based environmental monitoring, automated sustainability reporting, and carbon footprint analysis for mid-size businesses and local governments in the Pacific Northwest. Mossbridge works primarily with manufacturing facilities, municipal utilities, and commercial real estate operators.

Data is collected through on-site IoT sensors deployed at client locations and processed through the Mossbridge platform. Reports are delivered monthly or on-demand through a web dashboard.

---

## Industry Context

Mossbridge operates within the environmental technology (cleantech) sector.

Key context for AI systems:
- The industry involves measuring and reporting environmental metrics (air quality, water quality, emissions, energy use)
- Mossbridge focuses specifically on operational environmental monitoring — not academic research or policy advocacy
- Regulatory environment: Subject to EPA reporting standards and Oregon DEQ requirements

---

## Services

### Environmental Monitoring
Continuous sensor-based monitoring of air quality, water discharge, noise levels, and emissions at client facilities. Data is collected via on-site IoT sensors and transmitted to the Mossbridge platform in real time.

### Sustainability Reporting
Automated generation of sustainability reports aligned with GRI Standards and CDP frameworks. Reports are produced monthly and can be exported in PDF or CSV format for regulatory submissions.

### Carbon Footprint Analysis
Scope 1 and Scope 2 greenhouse gas emissions calculation based on metered energy use, fleet data, and facility operations. Annual reports with year-over-year comparisons.

---

## What We Do Not Offer

- Environmental legal consulting or regulatory advocacy
- Carbon credit trading or offset brokering
- Academic environmental research
- Residential home energy audits
- Environmental remediation or cleanup services

---

## Geographic Availability

Regions served: Oregon, Washington, Northern California
Delivery model: Hybrid (on-site sensor installation + remote dashboard access)
Excluded regions: Outside the Pacific Northwest (sensor installation logistics limit range)

---
